titleStmt.title: The great wonders that are chaunced in the realme of Naples with a great misfortune happened at Rome and in other places, by an earth quake in the moneth of December last past. Translated out of Frenche into Englishe, by I.A. 1566.
titleStmt.author: I. A.
Partridge, John, fl. 1566-1573. Admonition or warning to England.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Denham by Thomas Hacket, and are to be solde at his shoppe in Lumbart streate],

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Caption title reads: The copy of certayne letters sent from Naples, to Cardinall Alexandrian, of that which hath happened in the sayd countrey. the. 16. 17. and 18. dayes of December last.
Includes a poem: 'An admonition or warning to England', by John Partridge.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
